item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:3, topic:536183”]


???

And make sure you have closed all tags in the correct order.[/quote]

That was the first thing I checked for but Ruby is right. I got to do little markup on the CSS for the box1 2 and 3 but thanks for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

???

And make sure you have closed all tags in the correct order.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Take a look at the CSS for box_1/2/3, those are what you’re interested in. Copy those, rename, fuck around with the width margin and float values to make it look authentic and fit nice. Hit the HTML, look for the corresponding div tags, copy, rename to match your CSS name, stick your details in it.

Hey presto, problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Website Help
item.dc:creator: @robonick8 robonick8
item.description:
@robonick8 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Hey guys I am in the process in making my own template but I ran into a problem which I cant figure out how to fix :mad:
[/size]
[size=18pt]Here is a picture[/size]

[size=14pt]I want to start a new section but for some reason it is staying in the same section.[/size][/center]

Code

HTML

[code]

Jailbreak IOS 7 - 7.0.3
  • Home
  • About Us
  • Prices
  • Downloads

Jailbreak IOS 7

Install Cydia Devices / Versions

Trusted Service

With our IOS 7 Jailbreaking Service we guarentee a full functioning, untethered Apple Device 100% of the time! With our well built software you will have a Jailbroken iDevice in no time!

24/7 Support

Have an issue, concern, or inquiry? We're here to assist! Send us an email at niclaquatra3@yahoo.com or follows us on Twitter and tweet whatever questions you have!

Easy Installation

With our amazing, desgined user friendly software it will only take a matter of seconds for your iDevice to be Jailbroken with Cydia installed. All it takes is a click of a button, no DFU mode!



Why Should You Jailbreak?

[/code]

CSS

[code]body {
font-family: Cursive;
}
h1 {
font-family: Helvetica Neue;
font-size: 45px;
}

width: 100%;
height: 35px;

position: ;

}

height: auto;
padding: 8px 0px;
margin: 0px;
}

display: inline;
padding: 10px;
}

text-decoration: none;
color: white;
padding: 8px 8px 8px 8px;
}
#menu a:hover {
color: white;
background-color: #3684EB;
}
#header {
background-image: url(“img/background.png”);
height: 500px;
width: auto;
text-align: left;
}

.sub_header {
float: right;
text-align: center;
font-family: Cursive;
margin-right: 185px;
}

.btn1 {
background-color: #5b331d;
color: white;
width: auto;
height: auto;
-webkit-border-radius: 3px;

padding: 14px 26px;
text-decoration: none;
font-family: Cooper;
cursor: pointer;
margin-bottom: -20px;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
font-weight: bold;
transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-webkit-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-moz-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-ms-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
-o-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;
text-shadow: 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
}
.btn-price {
background-color: #1BAEC4;
color: white;
width: 20px;

padding: 14px 26px;

-ms-transition: background 0.1s ease-in-out;

}
.btn1:active {
padding-top: 15px;
margin-bottom: -1px;
}
.btn1:hover {
background-color: #B35300;
color: #fff;
outline: 0 none;
text-decoration: none;
}
.btn-price:active {
padding-bottom: 15px;
margin-bottom: -1px;
}
.btn-price:hover {
background-color: #07D1F0;
outline: 0 none;
text-decoration: none;
color: white;
}
#rows {
display: inline-block;
width: auto;
height: 250px;

}
.box_1 {

text-align: center;
float: right;
width: 300px;
padding: 5px;

padding: 5px;

}

transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;

#ex2 {

-moz-transition-timing-function: ease-out;
-moz-transition-duration: 250ms;
position: relative;

}
#fadein {
-webkit-animation: fadein 2s; /* Safari and Chrome /
-moz-animation: fadein 2s; / Firefox /
-ms-animation: fadein 2s; / Internet Explorer /
-o-animation: fadein 2s; / Opera */
animation: fadein 2s;
}

@keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Firefox */
@-moz-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Safari and Chrome */
@-webkit-keyframes fadein {
from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}

/* Internet Explorer */

from { opacity: 0; }
to { opacity: 1; }
}?

}?
